body.content:
Server Status Report

The server is running smoothly with no issues detected in the last 24 hours.

Database Backup Completed

The scheduled database backup was completed successfully at 3:00 AM.

High CPU Usage Alert

Warning: The CPU usage has exceeded 90% for the past 10 minutes.

Disk Space Warning

Alert: The disk space on server 'XYZ' is below 10%.

Network Latency Issue

Notice: High network latency detected between 2:00 PM and 2:30 PM.

Memory Usage Alert

Warning: Memory usage has exceeded 80% on server 'ABC'.

Service Downtime Notification

Alert: The 'XYZ' service was down for 15 minutes starting at 1:00 AM.

Unauthorized Access Attempt

Alert: An unauthorized access attempt was detected on server 'DEF'.

Patch Update Successful

The latest security patch was successfully applied to all servers.

Service Performance Report

The 'XYZ' service has been performing optimally with an average response time of 200ms.
